thread.title: Desmond Jones
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Desmond Jones

author: Desmond Jones
title: Desmond Jones
text: I read the other reviews and had some misgivings. It did take a couple weeks for them to put my sunglasses in the mail, but now that I have them they are authentic Prada, and my prescription is perfect. I would order from Otticanet again because of the price, although I did have to pay FEDEX import fees, taxes and duty.
